Title: In Defense of Showgirls OR: How Lois Learned to Stop Worrying and Love the Clones
Author: lovetvfan
Summary: Newly wed Lois returns home to find Clark watching the movie Showgirls, having apparently developed a new perspective on it. Lois begins to wonder who she actually married and what is going on. Also, what’s with the ceramic frog on the coffee table. She’s never seen that before…

Title: Fade to Black: Pilot (The Interview)
Author: lovetvfan
Summary: A Fade to Black for the very first episode. What would happen if Lois actually DID break her rules with Clark?

Title: Something Worth Fighting For
Author: AbigailEllenKent
Summary: Love is worth the risk... isn't it?

Title: When You're Not Strong
Author: lovetvfan
Summary: It’s been a year and a half since Lois and Clark were told they couldn’t have children or adopt. When Clark returns home after a rescue to see her sobbing over a negative pregnancy test, he knows they need to take matters into their own hands if they are ever going to have a child of their own. Meanwhile, in an alternate dimension, Buffy Summers the chosen one is dealing with the events that took place on her eighteenth birthday — including the betrayal from her watcher, Giles. What none of the Scooby’s know is that Ethan Rayne has returned to Sunnydale. He’s been hired to complete a job, but for his plan to work he’s going to need Superman’s blood…

Title: But Who's Got You? (2025SF for Amanda K)
Author: lovetvfan
Summary: Set in the Alternate Universe. Clark Kent is still getting used to being Superman. But in his world he has no secret identity to hide behind, no parents to confide in and the Lois Lane of his universe disappeared three years before he came to Metropolis. He was told that she was his soul mate and that finding her would be impossible. But Clark does not believe in soul mates and HG Wells knows that nothing is impossible.

Title: Cacophony (2025SF for BlueOwl)
Author: Idontknowwhatthatmeans5678 / SonicMessiah
Summary: Mid-season 1ish. Clark has been settling into Metropolis for a few months and is partnered with Lois Lane. For whom he has feelings, but she doesn't reciprocate. Or does she? A new chocolate shop opens in Metropolis. Fun ensues.

Title: A Whole New World (2025SF for BlindPassenger)
Author: 90sfangirl79
Summary: Lois & Clark have a secret to share with Lois's parents.

Title: A Bird in Hand (2025SF for kSaraSara)
Author: blg1987
Summary: When Alt Clark is thrown into a prison cell in the congo, he is surprised to find an unexpected cellmate hiding in the darkness...

Title: Just an Ordinary Man
Author: AbigailEllenKent
Summary: Lois convinced Superman to stay just one more second in Barbarians at the Planet, and Clark snapped. This is the aftermath, a few days later.

Title: 110 Kisses: This Isn’t Fair
Author: ksarasara
Summary: After Dr. Klein’s devastating news about fertility and with Clark half a world away, taking care of a natural disaster, Lois lets herself feel the weight of the news and wonders if there’s any hope to be found. A sad but poignant vignette in-between scene for “The Family Hour” and also part of a self-imposed challenge to write 110 ficlets with kisses based on a list of 110 prompts on tumblr.

Title: Solace
Author: FragmentedSandwiches
Summary: Set during season 4 episode 19. A fill-in scene after Clark revives Lois after having to save their lives by freezing her with his breath.

Title: Lois Lane's Three Favorite Things
Author: ludanme
Summary: As a fan of Lois & Clark for over 20 years, I always wondered—what if Lois got to turn the tables on Clark for once? This story came from that thought, sparked by all those moments he disappeared at the worst possible times.

Title: Pancakes and Power Outages
Author: 90sfangirl79
Summary: A thunder storm interrupts Lois & Clark’s relaxing evening.

Title: Date Night (Kerth Challenge #4)
Author: 90sfangirl79
Summary: Lois has a date to keep. Is everything as it seems?.

Title: The Ruse
Author: Socomama
Summary: Lois receives an invitation to her college reunion.  When she doesn't want to attend the event stag, it's Clark to the rescue. Set just after Chi of Steel. This story is an absolute shameless, frothy concoction of tropes and I'm not apologizing for any of it.

Title: The Best Man (Kerth Challenge)
Author: 90sfangirl79
Summary: Lois & Clark get invited to a wedding and find out something about themselves.

Title: I'm Right Here
Author: FragmentedSandwiches
Summary: A fill-in scene for season 4 episode 14- "Meet John Doe".It's a continuation of the scene where Clark tells Lois about the dreams he'd been having about her being taken from him by Tempus.

Title: Perfectly Decent
Author: 90sfangirl79
Summary: When the Daily Planet installs an instant messaging system on the employees' computers, secrets are revealed.

Title: Doomed
Author: 90sfangirl79
Summary: It’s the end of the world! Cat’s feeling lonely.

Title: Lois & Clark Elevator Shenanigans | Fan Edit
Author: FragmentedSandwiches
Summary: A little fan edit/fanvid I made in appreciation of Lois and Clark's elevator shenanigans on Lois & Clark: The New Adventures of Superman.Music: "Stricken" by No Doubt
